argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgring.1 | |- S = ( R |`s A ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_subrgring | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_mgpress | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s A ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) ) |
| 6 | 4 | #P_crngmgp | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. CMnd ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. CMnd ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` S ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( S e. Ring -> ( mulGrp ` S ) e. Mnd ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( mulGrp ` S ) e. Mnd ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s A ) e. Mnd ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s A ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s A ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_subcmn | |- ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. CMnd /\ ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s A ) e. Mnd ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s A ) e. CMnd ) |
| 14 | 7, 11, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s A ) e. CMnd ) |
| 15 | 5, 14 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( mulGrp ` S ) e. CMnd ) |
| 16 | 8 | #P_iscrng | |- ( S e. CRing <-> ( S e. Ring /\ ( mulGrp ` S ) e. CMnd ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 15, 16 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> S e. CRing ) |
